greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Reversed inversion vectors for the permutations of A060117, presented as pseudo-decimal numbers.
comment: If one uses the ordering of A055089 instead of A060117 (procedure PermRevLexUnrank instead of PermUnrank3R) one gets A007623 (Integers written in factorial base) which is a permutation of this sequence.
maple: Perm2InversionVector := proc(p) local n,i,j,a,c; n := nops(p); a := []; for i from 2 to n do c := 0; for j from 1 to i-1 do if(p[j] > p[i] then c := c+1; fi; od; a := [op(a),c]; od; RETURN(a); end;
xref: SiteSwap2ToDec procedure given in A060496 and PermUnrank3R in A060117.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 23 2001
